text:
A deeper look into the viral mutations of #SARSCoV2 and the antibodies being made to fight against it. Researchers have “completely mapped mutations that escape three leading anti-SARS-CoV-2 antibodies” in current vaccines.  

#Covid19 #virus #vaccine
